meanings.definition: The branch of medicine that deals with mental disorders attributable to diseases of the nervous system.
meanings.sent1: Neuropsychiatry helps doctors understand how brain issues can affect mental health.
meanings.sent2: She decided to specialize in neuropsychiatry to help patients with both neurological and psychological conditions.
meanings.sent3: The neuropsychiatry ward at the hospital was always full of interesting cases.
meanings.sent4: In the field of neuropsychiatry, unraveling the mysteries of the mind is like solving a complex puzzle.
meanings.sent5: Studying neuropsychiatry requires a deep understanding of both the brain and mental health.

meanings.definition: The study of the relationship between the brain and behavior.
meanings.sent1: Neuropsychiatry explores how the brain influences our actions and thoughts.
meanings.sent2: Researchers in neuropsychiatry aim to uncover the connections between brain functions and behaviors.
meanings.sent3: The neuropsychiatry professor had a unique way of explaining complex brain-behavior interactions.
meanings.sent4: Understanding neuropsychiatry is like deciphering the code that links our minds to our actions.
meanings.sent5: The textbook on neuropsychiatry provided fascinating insights into the brain's impact on behavior.
